edu.northwestern.at.morphadorner.server

Class MorphAdornerServerData

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.northwestern.at.morphadorner.server.MorphAdornerServerData

  • public class MorphAdornerServerData
extends java.lang.Object
    Base data for MorphAdorner restlet based server.

    Also stores common objects used by multiple configurations.

      • convertStringFileSize

        public static int convertStringFileSize(java.lang.String sFileSize)
        Convert string file size to integer value.
        Parameters:
        sFileSize - String file size. May have "k", "m", "g" following integer value to specify kilobytes, megabytes, or gigabytes, respectively.
        Returns:
        Integer file size. -1 if file size cannot be found because the input value was bad.
